sentence: Now, America has to take Dr. Mehmet Oz seriously as he runs for Senate in Pennsylvania in an already tightly contested race to replace Sen. Pat Toomey, a Republican who is retiring from office.
title: How Many Celebrity Politicians Have To Ruin America Before Americans Stop Electing Them?

sentence: The false Facebook post includes a photo of Winfrey, Dr. Mehmet Oz and acupuncturist Daniel Hsu, who appeared on Winfrey’s TV show in 2014.

title: Oprah Winfrey is not hawking diet pills

sentence: On the Republican side, Dr. Mehmet Oz, who became famous as a health guru on Oprah Winfrey’s show, is running against about a trillion other hopefuls.
title: ‘You Don’t Know Squat!’ and Other Signs of Our High-Minded Politics

sentence: This is truly a smart and good meme, because Dr. Mehmet Oz sold good patriotic lifesaving snake oil on the Oprah Winfrey show, while Dr. Fauci tyrannically asked Americans to get vaccinated against a deadly pandemic and to wear masks on their faces, which liberty-loving human beings simply cannot do.

title: Biden Shitcans Jerk GOP Losers From Fitness Council And They Will Not Shut Up

sentence: The celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz, whose TV career was given liftoff by Oprah Winfrey and who left it behind to run for the Senate in Pennsylvania, has a personal fortune of $76 million to $300 million, he disclosed Wednesday night in a government filing.
title: Wawa Stock and $500,000 in Cattle: Dr. Oz’s Senate Bid Reveals His Wealth

sentence: Dr Mehmet Oz, a Turkish-American TV personality who made more than 60 appearances on Winfrey's show before it stopped airing in 2011, is running to replace retiring Republican Pat Toomey in Pennsylvania.
author: Tom Acres
title: Donald Trump endorses celebrity surgeon known for guesting on Oprah in crucial Senate race

title: Why did Trump endorse Dr. Oz? One person's support may hold the answer

author: Rusty Weiss
title: I’m Just Going To Say This: Trump’s Endorsement Of Dr. Oz Is The Wrong Move
